borrow(address,uint256,uint256).details: Borrows tokens on the given position.

config().details: Returns the address of the config contract.

fetchPositionDebt(address,uint256).details: Returns the debt of the given position. Can't be view as it needs to call accrue.

fetchPositionLTV(address,uint256).details: Returns the LTV of the given position. Can't be view as it needs to call accrue.

getPositionTokens(address,uint256).details: Returns the position's collateral token and AmToken.

interestModel().details: Returns the interest rate model smart contract.

open(address,address,address).details: Opens a new position in the Beta smart contract.

oracle().details: Returns the address of the oracle contract.

pfTokens(address).details: Returns the address of BToken of the given underlying token, or 0 if not exists.

put(address,uint256,uint256).details: Puts more collateral to the given position.

repay(address,uint256,uint256).details: Repays tokens on the given position.

take(address,uint256,uint256).details: Takes some collateral out of the position.

underlyings(address).details: Returns the address of the underlying of the given BToken, or 0 if not exists.
